name: df-submnd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(csubmnd, cmpt(s0, cmnd, crab(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1))))))))
comment: A submonoid is a subset of a monoid which contains the identity and is closed under the operation. Such subsets are themselves monoids with the same identity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2015.)
